Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility

Class RegionUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility.RegionUtility
  • public class RegionUtility
extends Object
    This class contains static methods to make the region handling easier.

      • getRegionIdForNode

        public static String getRegionIdForNode​(String nodeId)
                                 throws InternalFederateException
        Get the region Id for a given Node.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - Node Id to find the region.
        Returns:
        The region Id of the node.
        Throws:
        InternalFederateException - Exception in case node Id is null.

      • getNodesForDestinationArea

        public static List<String> getNodesForDestinationArea​(GeoArea geoArea)
        Get all nodes for a destination area (of a geocast message).
        Parameters:
        geoArea - destination geoArea (GeoCircle or GeoRectangle).
        Returns:
        list of all nodes within the destination area.

      • getRegionsForDestinationArea

        public static List<CNetworkProperties> getRegionsForDestinationArea​(GeoArea geoArea)
        Get all regions for a destination area (of a geocast message).
        Parameters:
        geoArea - The destination geoArea.
        Returns:
        List of all regions that intersect the destination area.

      • getAllRegions

        public static List<CNetworkProperties> getAllRegions​(boolean includeGlobal,
                                                     boolean includeServers)
        Get the list of all configured regions, optionally including the "globalNetwork".
        Parameters:
        includeGlobal - include the "globalNetwork", otherwise deliver only AreaRegions.
        includeServers - include server "regions"
        Returns:
        list of all regions.
